validation.first_name_too_long: First name cannot be over 50 characters long.
validation.first_name_too_short: First name must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.last_name_too_long: Last name cannot be over 50 characters long.
validation.last_name_too_short: Last name must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.invalid_phone: Please provide a valid phone number without the country code and empty spaces.
validation.password_max_length: Password cannot be over 50 characters long.
validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.password_requirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one digit.
validation.name_too_short: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.name_too_long: Name cannot be over 50 characters long.
validation.message_too_long: Message cannot be over 500 characters long.

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.content: Cancellations must take place no later than 24 hours before the reserved time. For appointments cancelled during the same day, the business has the right to charge 50% of the price of the service.

about.legal_information.title: Legal Information
about.privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
about.privacy_policy.section_1: When you use this appointment booking service, the following personal information is collected from you:
about.privacy_policy.list_phone: Phone number - To contact you regarding your appointments or any changes.
about.privacy_policy.list_email: Email address - To send you confirmation emails, remiders, and important updates.
about.privacy_policy.list_password: Password - Your password is securely stored in an encrypted form to ensure the safety of your account
about.privacy_policy.section_2: Your personal information is used solely for the purpose of managing your appointments and providing you with the best service possible. Your information is never shared with any third parties.

contact.contact_header.text: Any questions? Please contact me via the form below, or send me a message in Instagram, and I will be happy to help you!
